alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 2:25PM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, and low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
